job.title: Software Programmer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Senior Software DeveloperDirect Hire- 100% Remote ARC Group is currently looking for a Senior Software Developer with experience in Full-Stack & Cloud. This opportunity is with a client of ours that has impressive growth in the Digital Media industry. The department location for this opportunity is in New York City & Boston, MA but you can be located at your home office as this role is 100% Remote.Our client offers excellent benefits, a competitive salary, and a good work-life balance. This role is 100% remote even after the pandemic is over. This is a direct-hire (permanent hire): Being so, candidates must be eligible to work for any employer without sponsorship now or in the future. No third parties.Essential Duties: Collaborative design and implementation of modern user-friendly interfacesCreation of tests (Unit, UI, ...) and documentationActive participation in the implementation and operation (e.g. troubleshooting) of new cloud-based servicesActive participation in building and improving our continuous integration and deployment processesParticipation (virtual or in-person) in planning meetings for coordination between the Scrum teamsRequired Experience:Bachelor's degree in computer science, MIS, or a related field required. Equivalent work experience in a similar position may be substituted for educational requirements.Minimum five years increasingly responsible software design and implementation experience using a standard coding language and/or platform requiredExpert (recognized authority) in developing and creating tests with Python (3.X)Advanced experience (practical application and applied theory) in at least one other programming language (PHP 7 and newer, C #, Golang)Practical experience in the application of agile methodologies (e.g. Scrum or XP)Intermediate experience (practical application) in developing online services and building APIsIntermediate experience (practical application) in using NoSQL and relational databases is desirableIntermediate experience (practical application) in application development in the FaaS / serverless environment is desirableIntermediate experience (practical application) in the area of development with / integration of authentication and authorization/solutions/protocols is desirablePowered by JazzHR3hPQiyNl7n
